Text: JSS Science and Technology University or Jagadguru Sri Shivarathreeshwara Science and Technology University - formerly Sri Jayachamarajendra College of Engineering (often shortened to SJCE), is a government aided technical co-educational college located in Mysore, Karnataka, India.
